oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Experimental evidence of enhancement in the anticipation time by cascading
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BARAIK, A
SINGH, H
PARMANANDA, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Anticipation synchronization
Cascading
Electrical circuits
SYNCHRONIZATION
SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have studied and verified experimentally the enhancement in the anticipation time by cascading Chua's circuits. The experiments have been carried out in a one dimensional array of Chua's circuits (2 to 8) coupled unidirectionally, such that each one acts as a master for the next one. By doing so, it has been observed that the anticipation time increases with an increase in the array size. Moreover, the numerical simulations of an array of eighty Chua's circuits verify the experimental observations. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
